# {^ h.abc123}Sample Document

This is a paragraph with **bold** and *italic* text.

## {^ h.def456}Inline Formatting

This text has {!highlight:yellow}highlighted{/!} content.

Some text with {!underline}underlined{/!} words.

Text with {!color:#cc0000}red color{/!} applied.

Code with {!mono}monospace font{/!} styling.

Combined: {!highlight:yellow, underline}highlighted and underlined{/!}.

## {^ h.ghi789}Embedded Objects

Here is an image:

{^= img_001 image}

And a chart:

{^= cht_002 chart}

An equation without ID:

{^= equation}

## {^ h.jkl012}Links

A [regular link](https://example.com).
